objects.query: SELECT Name, CatalogType, Code, Description FROM ProductCatalog
SELECT Name, CatalogId, Code, Description, ParentCategoryId, SortOrder FROM ProductCategory
SELECT Name, Status, PricingTerm, PricingTermUnit, SellingModelType FROM ProductSellingModel
SELECT Name, Code FROM AttributeCategory
SELECT Name, Code, Description, DataType, Status FROM AttributePicklist
SELECT Name, Code, IsDefault, DisplayValue, PicklistId, Sequence, Value, DisplayValue  FROM AttributePicklistValue
SELECT Name, DeveloperName, DataType, IsActive, DefaultValue, Description, Required, Code, Label, PicklistId FROM AttributeDefinition
SELECT AttributeCategoryId, AttributeDefinitionId FROM AttributeCategoryAttribute
SELECT Name, Code, Status FROM ProductClassification

SELECT Name, ProductClassificationId, AttributeDefinitionId, AttributeCategoryId, AttributeNameOverride, Status, DefaultValue, DisplayType, IsPriceImpacting, IsReadOnly, IsRequired, MaximumCharacterCount, MaximumValue, MinimumCharacterCount, MinimumValue, Sequence FROM ProductClassificationAttr

SELECT Name, IsActive, AvailabilityDate, BasedOnId, ConfigureDuringSale, IsAssetizable, ProductCode, CurrencyIsoCode, Description, Family, StockKeepingUnit, Type, QuantityUnitOfMeasure, IsSoldOnlyWithOtherProds FROM Product2
SELECT ProductCategoryId, ProductId, CatalogId,CurrencyIsoCode FROM ProductCategoryProduct
SELECT IsDefault, Product2Id, ProductSellingModelId, ProrationPolicyId FROM ProductSellingModelOption
SELECT Name, Code, ParentProductId, Sequence, MinBundleComponents, MaxBundleComponents, Description, CurrencyIsoCode FROM ProductComponentGroup
SELECT Name FROM ProductRelationshipType

SELECT Name, ParentProductId, ProductComponentGroupId, ChildProductId, ProductRelationshipTypeId, IsQuantityEditable, IsDefaultComponent, MaxQuantity, MinQuantity, DoesBundlePriceIncludeChild, Quantity, QuantityScaleMethod, IsComponentRequired, Sequence, ParentSellingModelId, ChildSellingModelId, ParentProductRole, ChildProductRole FROM ProductRelatedComponent
SELECT Name, IsActive, IsStandard FROM Pricebook2
SELECT Name, IsActive, AdjustmentMethod, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, Pricebook2Id, ScheduleType FROM PriceAdjustmentSchedule
SELECT Name, IsActive, LowerBound, PriceAdjustmentScheduleId, Product2Id, ProductSellingModelId, ScheduleType, SellingModelType, TierType, TierValue, UpperBound FROM PriceAdjustmentTier
SELECT Name FROM AttributeBasedAdjRule
SELECT Name, AttributeBasedAdjRuleId, AttributeDefinitionId, BooleanValue, DateValue, DateTimeValue, DoubleValue, IntegerValue, Operator, ProductId, StringValue FROM AttributeAdjustmentCondition

SELECT Name, AdjustmentType, AdjustmentValue, AttributeAdjConditionsHash, AttributeBasedAdjRuleId, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, PriceAdjustmentScheduleId, PricingTerm, PricingTermUnit, ProductId, ProductSellingModelId, ScheduleType, SellingModelType FROM AttributeBasedAdjustment

SELECT AdjustmentType, AdjustmentValue, EffectiveFrom, EffectiveTo, Name, PriceAdjustmentScheduleId, ProductId, ParentProductId, RootBundleId, ProductSellingModelId, ParentProductSellingModelId, PricingTerm, PricingTermUnit, RootProductSellingModelId, ScheduleType, SellingModelType FROM BundleBasedAdjustment
SELECT Name, IsActive, Pricebook2Id, Product2Id, ProductSellingModelId, UnitPrice, CurrencyIsoCode FROM PricebookEntry
